data.1: From the NetSuite Dashboard, Guest Lookup
From the Guest Record in View mode Click the Sales tab and view the Transactions subtab
Select the Quote you would like to convert into a Sales Order by clicking the Date or Document
The Quote will convert into a Sales Order and open in Edit mode.  Make sure the information is
correct and proceed with the transaction.
